name: MAGICAL DEATHPAIR
description:
Can you swear you won't betray me?


MAGICAL DEATHPAIR is an adventure game that sixteen witches are find themselves in a game of life and death.


Warning: This game contains scenes of explicit gore and sexual content.

STORY

It is November 2020 in a world where witches secretly protect Tokyo's peace.
A sudden monster appearance causes a huge rise in missing persons.
Sixteen of the best witches are sent out to deal with the problem and find themselves in a game of life and death.

Note: You can play the first chapter in this Steam version.


MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book

You can enjoy the game creator yatsunagi's artwork and commentary on MAGICAL DEATHPAIR.
(PDF data / Included in the game folder)

MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book (PDF / 40 pages)
